BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTCAS_CHAL_TRN (STR_CHALLAN_NO,DT_CHALLAN_DATE,STR_TYPE_OF_DEPOSITOR,STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE,STR_AGN_CODE,NUM_DEPT_CODE,STR_HOD_CODE,STR_OTHER_DEPOSITOR_INFO,STR_DEPOSIT_TYPE,NUM_AMOUNT_TO_BE_DEPOSIT,STR_PARTICULAR_OF_DEPOSIT,STR_PREPARATION_REMAKRS,STR_PREPARED_BY,STR_NON_EMP_USER_NAME,INT_USER_TYPE,STR_CHALLAN_STATUS,STR_DEPOSIT_INTO_CODE, STR_CLASSIFICATION_CODE,NUM_NO_OF_THOUSAND, NUM_NO_OF_FIVE_HUNDRED, NUM_NO_OF_HUNDRED, NUM_NO_OF_FIFTY, NUM_NO_OF_TWENTY, NUM_NO_OF_TEN, NUM_NO_OF_FIVE, NUM_NO_OF_TWO, NUM_NO_OF_ONE, NUM_COIN_AMOUNT, NUM_NO_OF_COIN,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,gnum_hospital_code, NUM_CR_CARD_AMT, NUM_DR_CARD_AMT, NUM_CASH_AMOUNT ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM ACTFS_CHAL_PRE_TRN T WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.STR_DS_NO=?
DELETE FROM ACTFS_CHAL_PRE_DTL T WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.STR_DS_NO=?

INSERT INTO ACTFS_AL_CHAL_PRE_DTL (STR_DS_NO,DT_DS_DATE,STR_CHALLAN_NO,DT_CHALLAN_DATE,STR_DEPOSIT_THROUGH,STR_INSTRUMENT_TYPE,STR_INSTRUMENT_NO,DT_INSTRUMENT_DATE,NUM_AMOUNT,STR_BANK_CODE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,gnum_hospital_code ) (SELECT T.STR_DS_NO,T.DT_DS_DATE,T.STR_CHALLAN_NO,T.DT_CHALLAN_DATE,T.STR_DEPOSIT_THROUGH,T.STR_INSTRUMENT_TYPE,T.STR_INSTRUMENT_NO,T.DT_INSTRUMENT_DATE,T.NUM_AMOUNT,T.STR_BANK_CODE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.gnum_hospital_code FROM ACTFS_CHAL_PRE_DTL T WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.STR_DS_NO=?)
DELETE FROM ACTFS_CHAL_PRE_DTL T WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.STR_DS_NO=?

INSERT INTO ACTCAS_CHAL_PRE_TEMP_TRN (NUM_FEE_PAGE_NO ,NUM_SERIAL_NO,STR_INSTRUMENTNO,DT_INSTRUMENTDATE,STR_INSTRUMENT_TYPE , NUM_INSTRUMENT_AMOUNT ,STR_BANK_DETAIL,STR_RECEIPT_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE ,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
Delete from ACTCAS_CHAL_PRE_TEMP_TRN where NUM_FEE_PAGE_NO=? and GNUM_SEAT_ID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTFS_DS_ACPT_TRN T SET T.STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_PREP=?,T.STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_NO=? WHERE T.STR_DS_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTFS_DS_ACPT_TRN T SET T.STR_PKG_COST_CHAL_PREP=?,T.STR_PKG_COST_CHAL_NO=? WHERE T.STR_DS_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTFS_DS_ACPT_TRN T SET T.STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_PREP=?,T.STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_NO=? WHERE T.STR_DS_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTFS_DS_ACPT_TRN T SET STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_PREP=STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_REQ,STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_PREP=STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_REQ,T.STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_NO=decode(T.STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_NO,'',?,T.STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_NO),T.STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_NO=decode(T.STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_NO,'',?,T.STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_NO) WHERE T.STR_DS_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTFS_DS_ACPT_TRN T SET T.STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_NO='' WHERE T.STR_HOS_COST_CHAL_REQ='N' AND T.STR_DS_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTFS_DS_ACPT_TRN T SET T.STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_NO='' WHERE T.STR_OTHER_COST_CHAL_REQ='N' AND T.STR_DS_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
